Variables.Name: Nb Victories to Win
Variables.Description: The number of winning rounds that a player needs to accumulate to win the tournament. Note, if everybody else is 'terminated', you also win.

Variables.Name: Coins Respawn Time
Variables.Description: The time after which coins will reappear once you collected them. If you are short in bullets, you will wish that time was short.

Variables.Name: Heart Respawn Time
Variables.Description: The time after which hearts will reappear once you collected them. A too low number can make kills difficult.

Variables.Name: Nb Start Bullets
Variables.Description: How many bullets do you have to start with. Less you hve more you will rely on coins to buy new one.

Variables.Name: Nb Start Bombs
Variables.Description: Bomb are extremely powerful. Kill one player with it and they are eliminated from the competition ('terminated').

Variables.Name: Renew each Round
Variables.Description: Whether bombs and bullets are reloaded after each round. If 'no' the player will rely a lot on collecting coins to buy bullets.

Variables.Name: Bullet Bundle Price
Variables.Description: A low price will make it easy to get bullets from collecting coins.

Variables.Name: Bomb Price
Variables.Description: Bomb are extremely powerful. Put a low price can make your tournament very tricky.
